channel.title: Blog on François Lancelot
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on François Lancelot

item.title: Sailing Simulator Web App :sailboat:
item.description:
A web app in which you can select the boat’s initial position, select wind orientation, select a route to follow, and run a simulation with a simple sailing model.
Developed with react-map-gl and boardgame.io. The web app is available at sailingsandbox.com ⛵ Bon vent et bonne mer (Fair winds and following seas) !

item.title: Sea Life IDentification App :fish:
item.description:
Sea Life IDentification App is an android mobile application that can automatically identify marine life from your underwater photos and videos.
Developed with Flutter and with a custom tensorflow lite model for the classification. The app is available in Google Play Store : Sea Life ID
